verses.roman:
vṛndāvane punaḥ 'kṛṣṇa' prakaṭa ha-ila
yāhāṅ tāhāṅ loka saba kahite lāgila

synonyms: vṛndāvane—at Vṛndāvana; punaḥ—again; kṛṣṇa—Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa; prakaṭa ha-ila—became manifested; yāhāṅ tāhāṅ—everywhere; loka—people; saba—all; kahite lāgila—began to speak.
translation: Everywhere the Lord went, all the people said, "Kṛṣṇa has again manifest at Vṛndāvana."
